roleset.name: act as staff for, work at (place)

example.name: no longer PC
example.text: He manned the UAL post yesterday with Christopher Bates , 33 , an energetic Long Islander who 's a dead ringer for actor Nicolas Cage .

propbank.arg: with Christopher Bates , 33 , an energetic Long Islander who 's a dead ringer for actor Nicolas Cage

example.name: both args
example.text: Wise will have realised that the likelihood of his manning the dug - out at Roots Hall was minimal at best .

propbank.arg: the dug - out at Roots Hall

roleset.note: MAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'man' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from man.01-v predicate notes)
MANNING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, man-v.01. (from manning.01-n)
